topic.title: National Socialism and Fascism - Books and articles to get informed
topic.body:
Post your favorite books and articles on NS and Fascism. I'll start.

Mein Kampf
The Doctrine of Fascism
SIEGE

1607868478_1MUqNCPTZnz9R3c39yWSQesf3gwbC.body: Covid exists, but is massively exaggerated in order to pave the way for the NWO.
